reviewText: Excellent detailed explanations, more than enough for someone who wants to take the best pictures possible without becoming a professional photographer.
Helped fill in the gaps that allows me to use my camera to it's fullest potential.  Well organized and very useful.

The camera in the dvd had different features then my Canon XSI. If you have the manual that came with your camera don't buy this dvd, you will not gain anything. I gave this dvd 2 stars because I have my manual, 4 or 5 stars if I didn't have a manual.
Not bad, not as indebt as I wanted (no advanced training) but ok for what it is over all four stars. Delivery was prompt and price was ok delivery was free which kept the price low.

I purchased this DVD for my wife and I as a primer for the Canon EOD Rebel XSi I got from Amazon in August.  My plan was to view it a few times, and then resell it.  After watching it the first time, I decided it is a keeper.  I was impressed with all the information that was covered.  It was also extremely concise and fast moving.  I feel I have a much better understanding of the many features available on this incredible camera.

Canon Rebel XSi DVD by QuickPro Camera Guides [Interactive DVD]This is an excellent guide for getting to know the camera and making use of all the features the modern cameras have. I would highly recommend this tutorial to anybody just entering the world of DSLR's. It explains things clearly and points out things that are not necessarily obvious when reading the cameras manual.
